notes.text: List: Internet Explorer 9 truncation handling for the content corrected
Button: DesignTime behavior added
SemanticPage: Worklist example updated
InputListItem: labelTextDirection property added to fully support RTL (right-to-left) mode
TextArea: valueLiveUpdate property added
Dialog: Explored app samples improved
Dialog: Resize and drag feature enabled
InputBase: Screen Reader support for value state added
MessageStrip: New control implemented
MultiInput: Copy and Paste feature enabled
ObjectListItem: Creating title text control no longer causes re-rendering
ObjectListItem: Screen Reader Support added
Panel: backgroundDesign property added
Popover: New placement types added
Token, Tokenizer: Screen Reader Support added
UploadCollection: API fileDeleted implemented
UploadCollection: API fileSizeExceed implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for change implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for fileDeleted implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for fileNameLengthExceed implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for uploadComplete implemented
UploadCollection: fileRenamed event added
UploadCollection: API JSDoc updated
semantic.SemanticPage: New set of semantic controls implemented
sinon: Included the latest version 1.14.1
MessagePage: showNavButton property and navButtonPress event added
routing.RouteMatchedHandler: setCloseDialogs now forwards the property to the targetHandler
Existence of namespace during Core.initLibrary() ensured
'response' function of sample MockServer corrected
JSDoc issues reported during nightly build solved
Focus on pull-to-refresh button now works for Internet Explorer
Input: removeAggreagtion now returns correct value
MessagePage, OverflowToolbar, SemanticControls: Metamodel description added
Popover: Calculation offset corrected
Routing API Documentation: The missing or incorrect @lends tags corrected
SegmentedButton: Check for undefined button in removeButton function corrected
TDG App: Encoding of German locale (ISO-8859-1) corrected
Table Breadcrumb sample: Order of execution issue solved
ResponsivePopover: Title is now bound at first opening of the sample application in the Demo Kit
CustomListItem: Text selection is now allowed
FlexBox: Error in Internet Explorer 9 avoided when parent is an UIComponent
ListBase: Swipe content changes no longer invalidates the list
Table: Cell content now decides overflow handling
Table: Popin content is now announced by screen readers
ActionSheet: The control no longer reacts to content size change
Bar: Issue when used in the context of the Dialog control  solved
ComboBox: Input events of read-only fields suppressed (Internet Explorer 11)
ComboBoxBase: Overlapping issue of the text on Internet Explorer 10 solved (sap_bluecrystal theme)
m.DatePicker, ui.commons.DatePicker: Keyboard navigation issues corrected
DateRangeSelection: Change is no longer fired if it's not changed
Dialog: Compact size is now applicable with onDialog style
Dialog: Drag now depends on the draggable property
Dialog: Explored app no longer points to missing files
Dialog: Keyboard no longer blinks on mobile
Dialog: Opening animation is changed from CSS to jQuery animation
Dialog: The control no longer forces line-height on icons
FeedListItem: Delete and Edit buttons are no longer displayed at the end of the line
FeedListItem: Sender is no longer followed by colon
GrowingEnablement: Build from scratch when there is no data
IconTabBar: Invalidation flow corrected
IconTabBar: Left padding is now correct
IconTabBar: The first text is no longer clipped on mobile devices when the first filter is 'showAll:true'
Input: ValueHelp icon size in compact mode changed
Input: Typo corrected to disable selection remembering
Input: ValueHelp icon is no longer on wrong position if description is used
Input: Width of F4 button adjusted on compact mode
Input: Delayed calls are now cleaned up when control is destroyed
Input: Suggestion popup no longer used on tablets
Input: Suggestion only opened if minimal input is made
Label: Aria-required attribute set
List: Internet Explorer 9 truncation handling for the content corrected
ListBase: ItemNavigation is no longer destroyed
MessageBox: Screen Reader improved
MessagePopover: Duplicate icon in compact mode corrected
MultiComboBox: Usage of empty strings as selected key allowed
MultiComboBox: Popup is no longer closed on first chosen token
MultiInput: MultiInput border padding adjusted
MultiInput: Token style adjusted in High-Contrast Black theme, to align with BlueCrystal theme
MultiInput: Suggestion popup no longer used on tablets
MultiInput: Copy and Paste improved with suggestion items
MultiInput: Focus setting for tokenChange event improved
MultiInput: Keyboard handling of multi-line MultiInput improved
MultiInput: Suggestion in phone mode improved
MultiInput: Token multi-line display in popup dialog improved
MultiInput: Closing multi-line of MultiInput in the explored example corrected
MultiInput: Indicator issue in mobile solved
MultiInput: Placeholder covering ValueHelp button in Internet Explorer corrected
MultiInput: Expanded multi-line MultiInput is now working inside SimpleForm
NavContainer: No longer removes the removed pages from the navigation stack
NavContainer: Memory behavior improved when app has a leak
Page: NavButton now has a tooltip
Page: setBusy overlays header+footer, add 'contentOnlyBusy'
Panel: Support for nested panels added
Popover: Check for empty nav container added
Popover: Control is no longer closed if virtual keyboard is open and 'of' element is no longer out of viewport
Popover: Arrow color corrected
Popover: Content wrapper now has a minimum width of 100%
PullToRefresh: Focus indicator with High-Contrast Black theme added
RadioButtonGroup: Selected index issue solved
SegmentedButton - API property selectedKey is now updated correctly
SelectDialog: Remember selection after cancel button pressed issue solved
SplitContainer: Hamburger button is now adapted when page shows/hides back button
SplitContainer: Master area now can't be closed when switched from ShowHide to Hide
SplitContainer: preventDefault now cancels navigation
Table: Table header row is no longer visible when all column headers are invisible
TablePersoDialog: Initial Focus with grouping corrected
Text: When text in editable form is empty min-height is added
Title, Label: Margin in transparent toolbar context for Bluecrystal and High-Contrast Black theme corrected
Tokenizer: Token truncation no longer affects only token text
UploadCollection.less: Incorrect rendering of attributes fixed
UploadCollection: API of typeMissmatch updated
UploadCollection: Adaptation of data type and documentation of maximumFileSize property corrected
UploadCollection: CSS adaptated for the first and last list item in the way that the space between the items fits
UploadCollection: Call of Method setFileType with undefined parameter no longer triggers an error
UploadCollection: Default tooltip of the fileUploader suppressed
UploadCollection: Filename without any dot now possible

UploadCollection: The focus on filename is now visible
UploadCollection: Buttons no longer overlap the text at resizing

UploadCollection: Property sameFileNameAllowed corrected
ViewSettingsDialog: Sorting options are now clearly separated
ViewSettingsDialog: Initial focus in filter details page corrected
ViewSettingsDialog: Initial focus is set to the first focusable item of the current page
FacetFilter: Remove icon issue solved

sap.m.Link: Link without href doesn't trigger beforeunload anymore

sap.m.MessageBox: The "details" property now supports JSON

sap.m.RadioButton: RadioButton is not removed from old group when setGroupName is called

sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Added origin parameter to close events

sap.m.SplitContainer: Hamburger button is shown when back button in detail header is invisible
